member.name: T:Kerosene.Tools.OnlyThisTestAttribute
member.summary: When used with a test method only those marked with this attribute are executed by the launcher.

member.name: T:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher
member.summary: Launcher for an arbitrary number of test methods gathered from the current program in execution.

member.name: M:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher.Execute
member.summary: Executes all the test methods in the current assembly. If any method is marked with the 'OnlyThisTest' attribute, then only those methods marked with the same attribute are executed.

member.name: M:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher.Execute``1
member.summary: Executes the test methods found on the given type. If any method is marked with the 'OnlyThisTest' attribute, then only those methods marked with the same attribute are executed.
member.typeparam: The test class where to find the test methods to execute.

member.name: M:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher.Execute(System.Type)
member.summary: Executes the test methods found on the given type. If any method is marked with the 'OnlyThisTest' attribute, then only those methods marked with the same attribute are executed.
member.param: The test class where to find the test methods to execute.

member.name: M:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher.LocateMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Locates the valid test methods on the given type.

member.name: M:Kerosene.Tools.TestsLauncher.Executor(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Reflection.MethodInfo})
member.summary: Executes the list of methods given.
